hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e export PATH=$PATH:/opt/cov-analysis/bin/ echo "Cleanup previous report" rm -rf reports/ umask 0022 rm -rf $(find . -name "*.OBJ") if test ! -d nspr; then hg clone https://hg.mozilla.org/projects/nspr else cd nspr && hg pull -u && cd - fi if test ! -d nss; then hg clone https://hg.mozilla.org/projects/nss else cd nss && hg pull -u && cd - fi
cd nss
echo "Rebuild all" cov-configure --gcc USE_64=1 cov-build --dir cov-int make nss_build_all
tar zcvf cov-build.tar.gz cov-int/
minimumsize=10000 actualsize=$(du -k cov-build.tar.gz | cut -f 1) if [ $actualsize -ge $minimumsize ]; then sh /opt/upload-to-coverity-nss.sh else echo "Unexpected filesize. Should be at least $minimumsize (found $actualize)" exit 1 fi
exit 0
